EmailTemplate.name: Customer Support:Helpdesk:How to Register and Submit tickets on Pivotal Portal
EmailTemplate.subject: How to Register for Support on Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
I am following up on your recent email requesting assistance to share the following information to help expedite any future requests.
Pivotal's support community provides the fastest result for known issues. Search here for articles and discussions: https://community.pivotal.io
Subscribers may also submit a case online. This is generally faster than requesting via email or phone. Please follow these instructions to register and open a case: https://content.pivotal.io/support/pivotal-support-for-subscribers
Please feel free to email support@pivotal.io if you have any questions during the registration process.
Kind regards,
